name: BoundedIterator_hasNextTest
description: Unit tests for the hasNext method of the BoundedIterator class.

test_cases.name: testHasNext_WithinBounds
test_cases.description: Tests the hasNext method when the iterator is within bounds.

test_cases.name: testHasNext_OutOfBounds
test_cases.description: Tests the hasNext method when the iterator is out of bounds.

test_cases.name: testHasNext_IteratorExhausted
test_cases.description: Tests the hasNext method when the underlying iterator is exhausted.
